about.HEADLINE: About us
about.TEXT: As an experienced construction supplier, we offer you high-quality products for construction and renovation projects. Our range includes power trowels, accessories, protective films, and concrete mortar – all made from premium materials. We place great importance on quality, fast delivery, and comprehensive advice to help you carry out your building projects efficiently and successfully. Rely on our expertise and let us support you as a dependable partner for all your construction needs.

welding.HEADLINE: Welding Technology in Metal Construction – Connections That Last
welding.DESCRIPTION_1: In our metal construction company, welding technology is a key element for stable, precise, and durable structures. Whether railings, staircases, gates, or custom fabrications – we join metal with the utmost care and in accordance with the latest technical standards.
welding.LIST_1: MIG/MAG, TIG, and manual arc welding
welding.LIST_2: Processing of steel, stainless steel, and aluminum
welding.LIST_3: Custom solutions for indoor and outdoor applications
welding.LIST_4: Fabrication of components and structures based on plans or measurements
welding.LIST_5: Welding according to DIN EN 1090 and DIN EN ISO 9606 standards
welding.LIST_6: Visual inspection and quality assurance by trained professionals
welding.DESCRIPTION_2: Our welders are qualified and work according to recognized standards. This ensures that every joint is not only technically flawless but also aesthetically clean – for the highest customer satisfaction and long-lasting quality.
welding.LIST_2_4: Custom-built Structures According to Customer Specifications

products.name: STS-11HC Topping Spreader
description_items: 6.1 m boom length (7 m reach from tires)
Joystick control - drive, steering, boom, rotation, head loading & spreading functions
Two-wheel, all-wheel, and crab steering modes
Automatic height control - keeps head close to the surface to reduce dust
Self-propelled with all-wheel drive and hydraulic motors
Steering Two-wheel, all-wheel, and crab steering

products.name: SRS-4e - Electric Laser Screed
description_items: Durable 3-phase 48 VAC electric motor - quiet, emission-free operation
All-wheel drive for traction on any surface
Smart steering turns tires to the desired angle for excellent maneuverability
Selectable steering modes: Two-wheel, all-wheel, and crab for optimal maneuverability
Compact design without subframe for better visibility and work safety
Uses Somero® features like Quick GradeSet System®, QuickPass, Soft Landing, and more
Comfort features like LED work lights, LCD display with diagnostic function
Training available through Somero Concrete Institute
Accessories: Toolbox, high-pressure cleaner, laser systems, 3-D Profiler, etc.

products.name: Spectra LL300S
description_items: The Spectra LL300S laser level features a rugged design with a 'Hardhat' rotor guard that provides excellent protection against drops and weather. Designed to withstand severe drops of up to 1 m directly onto concrete or up to 1.5 m when tipping over on a tripod, this means less downtime and costs due to damage from accidental falls. With additional arrow keys for slope, slope adjustment can be performed while the other axis remains self-leveling.

products.name: HR150U
description_items: The HR150U laser receiver is an excellent receiver for construction contractors involved in extensive interior construction and renovation work. The dual-sided LED display and integrated magnetic mounting make it ideal for leveling and alignment tasks indoors.

products.name: Spectra GL1425C
description_items: The self-leveling GL1425C dual-grade laser is the most rugged and cost-effective laser that performs three tasks: leveling, slope adjustment, and vertical alignment. Even under harsh construction site conditions, the GL1425C delivers reliable and precise performance, allowing you to work faster (up to 900 rpm) and smarter. The GL1425C features built-in Bluetooth and a dedicated Laser Remote App.

products.name: HV101
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® HV101 interior laser is a professional tool with an economical price tag. The HV101 laser can handle a variety of horizontal, vertical, and plumb applications. It is designed for both indoor and outdoor use with a receiver.

products.name: Theodolite DET-2
description_items: Every DET-2 is equipped with a plumb bob, NiMH battery pack and charger, alkaline battery pack, adjustment tools, rain cover, multilingual user manual, and a rugged, compact, O-ring-protected carrying case.

products.name: HV1305C
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® HV1305C red beam laser is the most rugged and cost-effective laser that provides both horizontal and vertical alignment. Even under harsh construction site conditions, the laser delivers reliable and precise performance, allowing you to work faster and smarter.

products.name: Spectra GL612N
description_items: The GL612N grade laser offers a single-grade capability of 25% and is also fully self-leveling in the vertical for building axis alignment or 90-degree setup. Simple, rugged, and user-friendly with a menu-driven interface replicated on the wireless remote, the GL612N is the first choice for any contractor needing versatile grade capabilities.

products.name: LR60 & LR60W
description_items: The LR60 & LR60W laser machine display receivers are designed to be used as standalone display receivers on grading and excavation equipment, including: bulldozers, excavators, backhoe loaders, scrapers, and trenchers.

products.name: DG613G
description_items: Compact and powerful, the DG613G ultra-bright green beam laser combines outstanding performance with productivity. Advanced features are user-friendly and allow for easy, quick setup.

products.name: Spectra LL500
description_items: The LL500 laser level is a one-person leveling system designed for longer measurements across the entire construction site. Precise, stable, and reliable, the LL500 has a working diameter of 500 m, increasing productivity by reducing the need for multiple setups on a large construction site.

products.name: Spectra LT56 & LT58G
description_items: The device is compact, lightweight, and easy to mount. Installations on high ceiling structures will be a quick and easy task compared to conventional heavy rotary lasers and cumbersome mounts.

products.name: Spectra DG613
description_items: Compact and powerful, the DG613 red beam laser combines outstanding performance with productivity. Advanced features are user-friendly and allow for easy, quick setup. Easy to use, with the new menu-driven user interface.

products.name: Spectra GL622N Grade Laser
description_items: Spectra Precision® GL622N/GL622IR grade laser. Easy-to-use, fully featured automatic grade lasers. The GL622N dual-grade laser is a rugged, self-leveling laser with a grade capability of -25% to +25% and can be used for a variety of grading, excavation, and alignment applications by general and specialty contractors.

products.name: Spectra GL412N
description_items: The GL412N is a single-grade laser that, in addition to its grade range of up to 15%, also offers long-range operation. Operate the laser with remotes with greater range. With a wireless remote with a range of up to 100 m, you have the ability to make grade adjustments and perform them remotely, which can significantly reduce setup time.

products.name: Spectra GL710
description_items: Designed for grading professionals, the Spectra Precision GL700 series of grade lasers is the most advanced on the market. With industry-leading performance and accuracy, you can be confident that the GL700 series delivers on slope work over long distances and high accuracy requirements.

products.name: Spectra LL1505C
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® LL1505C laser level is the most rugged laser level available, tough enough to handle a variety of general and concrete construction applications. The rugged laser can withstand drops of up to 1 m onto concrete and tripod tip-overs of up to 1.5 m. This strength, combined with full weather and dust resistance, reduces downtime and lowers repair costs over the product's lifetime.

products.name: Spectra LL300N
description_items: The Spectra LL300N laser level features a rugged design with a 'Hardhat' rotor guard that provides excellent protection against drops and weather. Designed to withstand severe drops of up to 1 m directly onto concrete or up to 1.5 m when tipping over on a tripod, this means less downtime and costs due to damage from accidental falls.

products.name: Spectra DG813 Pipe Laser
description_items: When speed, improved reliability, ruggedness, and long-lasting performance are required for pipe laying, the DG813 is the answer. Fully waterproof, with a large self-leveling grade range, the DG813 is so fast, so smart, and so easy to use that it is an unrivaled laser tool for pipe laying.

products.name: HV1305GC
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® HV1305GC green beam laser is the most rugged and cost-effective laser that provides both horizontal and vertical alignment. Even under harsh construction site conditions, the laser delivers reliable and precise performance, allowing you to work faster and smarter.

products.name: HV302
description_items: The HV302 can handle a variety of horizontal, vertical, and plumb applications for both indoor and outdoor projects. Its highly visible beam allows for simultaneous rotating and 90-degree plumb references and is also easy to spot in brightly lit interiors. Various configurations ensure you have the right tool for the job.

products.name: HR1220
description_items: The HR1220 laser receiver detects both red and green laser beams generated by cross-line lasers such as the LT52R, LT52G, LT56, and LT58G. The receiver can extend the indoor working range of these cross-line lasers and increase versatility by enabling outdoor use.

products.name: LP51 & LP51G Laser Pointers
description_items: The Spectra LP51 and LP51G 5-beam laser pointers are designed for a wide range of interior construction applications. These rugged laser pointers offer multiple benefits for general and interior construction contractors, electricians, plumbers, and a variety of tradespeople.

products.name: HV302G
description_items: The self-leveling Spectra Precision® HV302G Horizontal/Vertical Laser offers exceptional versatility and superior green beam visibility for increased productivity at a great price. The HV302G can handle a variety of horizontal, vertical, and plumb applications optimized for indoor projects. Even under bright indoor conditions, the HV302G's highly visible green beam delivers reliable and precise performance, allowing you to work faster and smarter.

products.name: HR320
description_items: The HR320 laser receiver is a rugged laser receiver for outdoor leveling applications. LCDs on the front and back display a 5-segment slope arrow indicating the slope position. A loud buzzer is designed for noisy construction sites.

products.name: LT52G & LT52R Cross-Line Lasers
description_items: The Spectra LT52G and LT52R are the tools for all trades. They eliminate the need for a contractor to buy two tools by combining a 5-beam laser pointer with a horizontal and vertical cross-line laser in one product. The versatile, self-leveling laser tool can be used in a variety of construction applications.

products.name: Spectra GL422N
description_items: The GL422N is a dual-grade laser that, in addition to its grade range of up to 15%, also offers long-range operation. Operate the laser with remotes with greater range. With a wireless remote with a range of up to 100 m, you have the ability to make grade adjustments remotely, which can significantly reduce setup time.

products.name: LT20 & LT20G Line Lasers
description_items: The Spectra LT20 cross-line laser is a self-leveling multipurpose tool with 1 vertical plane and 1 horizontal plane. For interior construction and renovations, the LT20 laser is used for horizontal and vertical alignment, wall layout, acoustic ceiling installation, and fine woodworking.

products.name: Spectra GL722
description_items: The GL722 dual-grade laser is one of the most advanced grade lasers on the market. Long-range operation, advanced wireless remote control, grade adjustment, plane lock, and automatic axis alignment mean you can perform quick but highly precise setups for any grade application.
